body.bibl: Watt, John W. “Patriarch Timothy’s Letter 43, the New Philosophical Text from Dayr al-Suryān, and the Study of Greek Philosophy in Syriac.” In Porphyry in Syriac: The Treatise On Principles and Matter and Its Place in the Greek, Latin, and Syriac Philosophical Traditions, edited by Yury N. Arzhanov, 161–73. Philosophy and Sciences in the Christian Orient 1. Berlin: Walter de Gruyter, 2024.
